title: Hexo的同步与更新
text: 同步本地项目1$ git pull 下载项目12345678$ git clone https://github.com/hyphhh/hyphhh.github.io.git$ git hyphhh.github.io$ npm install hexo$ npm install$ npm install hexo-deployer-git$ npm install hexo-renderer-less --save$ npm install hexo-generator-feed --save$ npm install hexo-generator-json-content --save 更新添加新markdown1$ hexo new "My New Post" 把项目同步到branch hexo123$ git add .$ git commit -m "blabla"$ git push origin hexo 发布页面到branch master12$ hexo install hexo-deployer-git --save$ hexo generate -deploy

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
